background_context.situation: New to the area and seeking social connections.
background_context.environment: Engaged in a newcomers club to meet people.
background_context.constraints: Limited time due to other commitments.

goals_motivations.drives: Desire to socialize and integrate into the community.
goals_motivations.achievements: Wants to meet new people and attend events.

behaviors_patterns.current_work_style: Primarily uses the website to find events, but recently started using the app.
behaviors_patterns.habits: Checks the calendar frequently for upcoming events and monitors email updates.

obstacles: Website navigation is cumbersome, requiring multiple steps to access information.
Lack of a search feature on the website to find specific events.
Confusion regarding event registration and cancellation processes.
what_doesnt_work: Inconsistent information display regarding event registration status.
Difficulty in accessing personal event history on the website.

improvements: A more efficient website with a search function for events.
Ability to see event registration status and names of attendees easily.
An archive of newsletters and announcements on the website.
needs_desires.looking_for: Easier navigation and clear information regarding events and committee roles.

attitudes_beliefs.mental_models: Believes that easily accessible information can enhance user experience.
attitudes_beliefs.preferences: Values simplicity and clarity in digital interfaces.

technical_comfort.technical_abilities: Comfortable with basic web navigation and mobile app usage.
technical_comfort.learning_preferences: Prefers hands-on experience and direct guidance.

quotes: I don't remember it being hard and I know like it I might have remembered if it were frustrating but I don't remember that.
The app is much better because it is faster and has less steps to go through.
